settings.select: A.*,B.Num as BookNum,B.UnitPrice as BookUnitPrice,B.Num as ActualNum,B.UnitPrice as ActualUnitPrice,B.Num * B.UnitPrice as BookMoney
settings.from: mms_material A inner join mms_warehouseStock B on B.MaterialCode = A.MaterialCode and B.Num >0 inner join mms_warehouse C on C.WarehouseCode = B.WarehouseCode
